name: Wolf And Sheep (httpsgames)
description:
This is a two player game based off of the themes "Collaboration", "2-by-2", and "Noah's Ark" 

Assets I used from other people below:

Admurin Free Chests

Kacper Woźniak Tiny Animals

Kicked-In-Teeth Bubble Emoticons

Kicked-In-Teeth Button UI

Brullov Fire Anim

Creativekind Necromancer Character
